newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Magician raises HK$105 mln in shr issue.
newsitem.headline: Magician raises HK$105 mln in shr issue.

text.p: Magician Industries (Holdings) Ltd said on Wednesday it planned to issue 45 million new shares to its parent Concept Developments Ltd at HK$2.40 per share, raising net proceeds of about HK$105 million.

The general housewares maker said in a statement that Concept Development had also agreed to place 45 million existing Magician shares, or 12.05 percent of the enlarged share capital, with private investors at the same price.
It said net proceeds would be used to purchase new machinery and equipment for the manufacture of plastic bottles, repay bank borrowings and as additional general working capital.
Concept Development's stake in Magician will be reduced to 56.89 percent from 64.69 percent after the transactions.
Magician shares closed at HK$2.475 on Monday before trading in the stock was suspended on Tuesday. Trading was expected to resume on Wednesday, the company said.
